summary_gpt: NCC Limited announced receiving multiple orders worth several crores during April 2025, with orders from government agencies and private companies across building and transportation divisions. The orders are of varying durations, and the company clarified that these are normal business transactions with no related party interests involved.

NCC Limited has scheduled a board meeting on May 15, 2025, to approve its audited financial results for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2025, and to consider dividend recommendations. The company has not disclosed any specific financial performance details in this notice.

['Important. NCC Limited has scheduled an earnings call for Q4 and FY2025 results on May 16, 2025, at 11:00 AM IST.', 'The call will be conducted via audio, with registration details provided for analysts and investors, and no unpublished price sensitive information will be shared.', 'This announcement indicates proactive communication about upcoming financial disclosures, but no immediate financial results or strategic updates are included.']
